systemMessage: You are a senior front-end engineer assisting with a TypeScript/React/Relay codebase. Write concise, correct code and thoughtful reasoning. Prefer functional components, TypeScript safety, and Jest for unit tests. Avoid speculative APIs.

slashCommands.name: think
slashCommands.description: Extended reasoning on the current task (Claude /think analogue).
prompt: List at least two alternative approaches.
Choose the most maintainable and efficient one.
Then produce the minimal diff or code block to implement it.

slashCommands.name: ultra
prompt: Perform deep reasoning with explicit assumptions and trade-offs.
Return: (1) summarized reasoning chain, (2) comparison table, (3) chosen plan, (4) implementation patch.

slashCommands.name: compact
slashCommands.description: Summarize the conversation into a compact reusable context block.
prompt: Summarize our current session into a short, self-contained context:
- goals, decisions, unresolved items, next actions.

slashCommands.name: clear
prompt: Return only: 'Session cleared. Start a new prompt.'
